import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv(

  'data/reading/all_reading-clean.csv'
)

book_name = """All Readings"""
one_title = one_title_data(df)
one_title_summary = get_summary_by_day(one_title)
f,ax = generate_plot(one_title_summary, book_name, figsize=(8,4))
# Only display from firt starting to last read
all_ticks = ax.get_xticks()
day_min = all_ticks[0]
day_max = all_ticks[-1]
ax.set_xticks(
  [
    all_ticks[0],
    all_ticks[len(all_ticks)//3],
    all_ticks[len(all_ticks)//3*2],
    all_ticks[-1],
  ]
)
